headline: Washington-Tehran Friction Casts Spotlight on Afghanistan’s Vulnerabilities
abstract: Afghan officials fear that an escalation between Iran and the United States could hurt chances for peace with the Taliban during a critical time.
lead_paragraph: In the days after a United States drone strike killed Iran’s top intelligence and military operative, President Ashraf Ghani of Afghanistan scrambled to keep his country out of a cycle of escalation between the two powers.
keywords: United States Defense and Military Forces
